author: Staff Reporter
text:
Burglars made a vain bid to loot a private bank in Omalur after the alarm went on and police arrived on the spot here on Saturday night.

The branch located on Dharmapuri Road is functioning for the past one year with ATM. On Saturday, burglars gained entry into the bank and attempted to break the locker.

However, the siren link that is connected to the Omalur police station went on and police rushed to the bank. The bank officials were informed and the bank was opened on Sunday in the presence of the police. It was found that unidentified persons attempted to break the locker and also searched the manager’s room. Since the locker could not be broken, the cash and jewellery were safe.
title: Burglary attempt foiled
